did.unittitle: Coremakers Union of Auburn, NY, Minute Books, 1891-1903
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two volumes of minutes of the Coremakers International Union of America: Local 5394, dating from 1891 to 1903, and Local 10, dating from 1899 to 1903. Also included are two volumes of dues ledgers.

bioghist.p: The Coremakers Union No. 5394 was organized on April 17, 1891 in Auburn, New York.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two volumes of minutes of the Coremakers International Union of America: Local 5394, dating from 1891 to 1903, and Local 10, dating from 1899 to 1903. Also included are two volumes of dues ledgers.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Coremakers Union of Auburn, NY, Minute Books #5673. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5671: International Molders Union, No. 107 (Auburn, NY) Minute Books 5671 mf: International Molders Union, No. 107 (Auburn, NY) Minute Books on Microfilm 5673 mf: Coremakers Union of Auburn, NY, Minute Books on Microfilm 5911: TWUA Locals 1242, 3, 607, 129, Greater Northern Joint Board Minute Books
